response_parsed.title: Type-checking REST APIs using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide demonstrates how to leverage FastAPI, a modern, fast (high-performance), web framework for building APIs with Python 3.12+, to implement type checking in your REST APIs.
key_points: FastAPI is built upon the Starlette and Pydantic libraries
FastAPI provides comprehensive type checking and validation
The framework simplifies API development with powerful features like OpenAPI 3.0 support, router, middleware, and more

code_examples.code:
```
from fastapi import FastAPI
app = FastAPI()

class Item(BaseModel):
    name: str
    description: str
    price: float

@app.post('/create_item/')
def create_item(item: Item):
    return item
```

version_notes: FastAPI version 0.73.0 or later is required for Python 3.12+ support
Python 3.12+ offers improved performance and new features, such as pattern matching
caveats: Ensure that you have the latest version of FastAPI installed (pip install --upgrade fastapi)
Understand the limitations of type checking in REST APIs when dealing with complex objects or third-party libraries
